TypeSignature.Value: public class ResourceDictionary : System.Collections.IDictionary, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Markup.INameScope, System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext

.class public auto ansi ResourceDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.Windows.Markup.INameScope, class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class ResourceDictionary Implements IDictionary, INameScope, ISupportInitialize, IUriContext
public ref class ResourceDictionary : System::Collections::IDictionary, System::ComponentModel::ISupportInitialize, System::Windows::Markup::INameScope, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext

summary.span: 提供一个哈希表/字典实现，其中包含组件所使用的 WPF 资源以及 WPF 应用程序的其他元素。

span.span: Provides a hash table / dictionary implementation that contains WPF resources used by components and other elements of a WPF application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的项不会立即处理当加载应用程序代码时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]加载程序。The items in a are not immediately processed when application code is loaded by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loader. 相反，作为对象，仍然存在，并且仅当它们专门请求时进行处理的各个值。Instead, the persists as an object, and the individual values are processed only when they are specifically requested. 类不派生自。The class is not derived from . 相反，类实现但依赖于内部。Instead, the class implements but relies on a internally. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]、类通常是为多个对象元素值的隐式集合元素`Resources`属性，在给定属性元素语法中。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], the class is typically an implicit collection element that is the object element value of several `Resources` properties, when given in property element syntax. 有关详细信息中的隐式集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，请参阅[在详细信息的 XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For details on implicit collections in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 例外情况是当你想要指定合并的字典;有关详细信息，请参阅[合并资源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。An exception is when you want to specify a merged dictionary; for details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md). 另一种可能[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用法就是声明为离散的资源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件，并在加载它运行时或将其作为资源或松散文件包括 （完全信任） 项目中。Another possible [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage is to declare a resource dictionary as a discrete [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, and either load it at run time with or include it in a (full-trust) project as a resource or loose file. 在这种情况下，可以声明为对象元素，充当的根元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In this case, can be declared as an object element, serving as the root element of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 必须映射适当的 XML 命名空间值 (默认为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]命名空间和通常`x:`为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]命名空间) 到元素，如果你打算将其用作根元素。You must map the appropriate XML namespace values (default for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] namespace and typically `x:` for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] namespace) onto the element if you plan to use it as the root element. 然后，可以添加定义的资源，每个都有一个值的子元素。Then you can add child elements that define the resources, each with an value. ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourcesProperty**resourcesProperty* 指定的属性元素，其中该属性的值类型是一个属性。A property specifying a property element, where the value type of that property is . 通常，这是`Resources`属性或，或中应用程序资源的情况。Typically, this is the `Resources` property of or , or of in an application resources case. *oneOrMoreResources**oneOrMoreResources* 作为对象元素所指定的一个或多个资源。One or more resources specified as object elements. 你指定每个资源必须具有[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)分配。Each resource that you specify must have an [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试添加重复的键会引发异常。Attempting to add a duplicate key raises an exception. 密钥始终将添加到基的字典。Keys are always added to the base dictionary. 密钥存储在在当前未检查重复，仅基字典检查重复项。Keys in within the current are not checked for duplication, only the base dictionary is checked for duplicates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法是相对值的内容将要加载。Calling this method is an indication that the contents of the are about to be loaded. 该过程的下一步是调用。The next step in the process is to call . 不要调用不止一次，然后才能调用。Do not call more than once, before calling . 执行此操作将引发的异常。Doing so will raise an exception.

exception.span: 在调用 前多次调用了 。

span.span: Called more than once before was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你需要清除合并的字典项时，获取从特定字典集合并专门调用上，尽管通常字典是远程的你可能没有访问权限。If you need to clear merged dictionary items, obtain the particular dictionary from collection and specifically call on that , although typically the dictionaries are remote and you might not have access. 或者，删除整个从通过泛型集合上调用删除。Alternatively, remove the entire from by calling Remove on the generic collection.

Value of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果请求的项不是此资源字典中，框架资源系统还会检查合并的字典。If the requested key is not in this resource dictionary, the framework resource system will also check the merged dictionaries. 检查按项或索引通常不检索资源的首选的方法。Checking a by item or index is not generally the preferred way to retrieve resources. 你应改为调用的方法，是能够参与完整资源查找过程，并查找资源的其键，以及可以在应用程序或主题查找资源。You should instead call methods that are capable of participating in the full resource lookup process and look up resources by their keys, and that can find the resources in applications or themes. 是此类方法，并且可在任意。 is such a method, and is present on any . 否则你尝试查找资源不匹配的 true 的运行时行为。Otherwise your attempt to find the resource does not match the true run-time behavior. 但是，直接从单个字典中获取资源可能适合情况就从已知在检索资源位置，并且这样做，因此，若要避免可能性能和作用域的运行时键查找的影响。However, obtaining resources directly from an individual dictionary might be appropriate if you are retrieving resources from a known location, and are doing so to avoid the possible performance and scope implications of run-time key lookup. 不使用索引器定义中的集合成员[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You do not use indexers to define collection members in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 相反，你创建子元素标记中。Instead, you create child elements in markup. 子元素是中的任一子元素，或其中属性类型是一个属性元素的`ResourceDictionary`。The child elements are either child elements of , or of a property element where the property type is `ResourceDictionary`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用法部分中。For details, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage sections in .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此 中包含的所有键的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all keys contained in this .
The collection of all keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性存在，因为它必需的，但通常不适用于大多数方案。This property exists because it is required by , but generally is not useful for most scenarios. 返回的键不包括内的键。The returned keys do not include keys within the . 此外键集合是基字典中的键的快照。Also the keys collection is a snapshot of the keys in the base dictionary. 如果随后对此进行更改，存储将不会反映所做的更改。If you subsequently make changes to this , a stored will not reflect the changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MergedDictionaries As Collection(Of ResourceDictionary)

summary.span: 获取 字典的集合，这些字典构成了合并字典中的各种资源字典。

span.span: Gets a collection of the dictionaries that constitute the various resource dictionaries in the merged dictionaries.
The collection of merged dictionaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过添加合并字典到所引用的泛型集合。Dictionaries are merged by adding a to the generic collection referenced by . 合并没有资源标记中定义的元素。A merged does not have resource elements defined within it in markup. 相反，合并的字典，它是并且不包含标记子元素定义 （或通过代码添加任何元素），但与[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]指定的。Instead, the merged dictionary is a with no markup child elements defined (or with no elements added through code), but with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] specified for . 代码使合并来自外部源，如应用程序后，附带的单独的资源程序集的字典"松散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]"，或特定的本地化或全局资源程序集。The designation enables the merged dictionary to come from an external source, such as a separate resource assembly that ships with the application, "loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]", or a specific localization or global resources assembly. 指定资源中的元素具有指定不支持。Specifying resource elements within a that has specified is not supported. 中的查找行为集合将搜索上一次添加第一个和搜索停止就会立即找到请求的键。Lookup behavior within the collection will search the last-added first, and the search stops as soon as a requested key is found. 整个合并字典的集合的重复键不是非法的。Duplicate keys across the collection of merged dictionaries are not illegal. 合并的字典行为的详细信息，请参阅[合并的资源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。For more information on merged dictionary behavior, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md). ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries**oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries* 一个或多个对象元素。One or more object elements. A用于没有集合内容，并指定引用完整的属性远程。A used for does not have collection content, and specifies a attribute that references the complete remotely. ## Examples 下面的示例指定两个元素合并到主。The following example specifies two elements to be merged into the primary . [!code-xaml[ResourceMergeDictionary#MergedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ResourceMergeDictionary/CS/default.xaml#mergedxaml)]

XAML 命名空间方法实现为中的无效版本以使它清楚该 XAML 名称不适用于资源。The XAML namescope methods are implemented as inoperative versions in to make it clear that XAML names do not apply to resources. 调用此方法将导致引发。Calling this method will cause a to be thrown.

summary.span: 从基字典中移除带有指定键的项。

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the base dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不具有指定键，包含的元素保持不变。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不会引发异常。No exception is raised. 此方法不会删除从密钥。This method does not remove keys from the . 你必须获取特定于从要移除的集合，这些键，但那可能不是可能由于通常要远程访问此类字典。You must obtain the specific from the collection to remove those keys, but that might not be possible because you are typically accessing such a dictionary remotely.

span.span: The is locked or read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Source { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要从中加载资源的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to load resources from.

value.span: 外部资源字典的源位置。

span.span: The source location of an external resource dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，指定为一个包 URI，它引用由你的应用程序构建项目作为一个按未编译的资源或内容生成操作包含的资源字典的位置。Typically, is specified as a Pack URI, which references the location of a resource dictionary that is included as a noncompiled Resource or Content build action by your application building project. Pack URI 格式的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的包 Uri](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。For details on the Pack URI format, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md). 通常情况下，只能为设置属性为指定属性 (或者作为中的属性元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或被代码中的集合的项)。Generally, the property is set only for a that is specified for the property (either as a property element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or as a item of the collection in code). 在此上下文中的值设置位于所提供的字典内容将合并[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]到当前。In this context, setting the value for will merge the dictionary contents found at the supplied [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] into the current . 任何加载失败将导致异常引发。Any load failures will cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例指定两个元素合并到主。The following example specifies two elements to be merged into the primary . [!code-xaml[ResourceMergeDictionary#MergedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ResourceMergeDictionary/CS/default.xaml#mergedxaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 arrayIndex) cil managed
virtual void System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(Array ^ array, int arrayIndex) = System::Collections::ICollection::CopyTo;

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性存在，因为它必需的，但通常不适用于大多数方案。This property exists because it is required by , but generally is not useful for most scenarios. 返回的值不包括中的值。The returned values do not include values within the . 此外该集合为基的字典中的值的快照。Also the collection is a snapshot of the values in the base dictionary. 如果随后对此进行更改，存储将不会反映所做的更改。If you subsequently make changes to this , a stored will not reflect the changes.
